text: Reminder: You can find our developer content on HubSpot academy by going to <https://academy.HubSpot.com/results?q=developer&library=true>  Additionally we have a YouTube Channel with a developer podcast and some great developer content <https://www.youtube.com/c/HubSpotDevelopers/playlists>

have some of the certification courses been removed? i got a notification to re-up CMS Hub Implementation, and I looked back through the course videos a couple days ago, and I went to take the exam today and got a "missing content" message. I don't even see a reference to the certification on Google anymore -- searching gives me results for Developer Certification (which I have).

Suddenly, i have three fewer certifications in my completed list. Not sure what the other two are.

My employer did just lose their partner status, but I don't see any documentation saying personal academy certifications are dependent on partner status. Agency accreditations, yes, but certifications? Did i lose certifications because I don't work for a partner?

:confused: .......

Hey <@UDEASNWEB>, the CMS Hub Implementation certification is a partner-only certification, and if your certification expired and you're no longer a partner, unfortunately, you won't be able to renew your CMS Hub Implementation certification.
okay thanks! <@U02227D27V3> is there a list somewhere of what the partner-only certifications are? i wasn't able to find documentation on that

Unfortunately, this list isn't freely available to non-partners, so I can't send you any official stuff, but I can give you a list of the developer-related ones:

• CMS Hub Implementation
• Salesforce Integration
• Growth Driven Design
• Data Integrations
• HubSpot Architecture I: Data Models and APIs
• HubSpot Architecture II: Content and Messaging Tools
• CRM Data Migration
